ygData.subject: RE: Magical adventure in North Freeport :)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ah, ok. Being unfamiliar with any exploits usable by being up on the walls, and honestly never haven given it any thought, I wasn t familiar with what
ygData.messageBody:
> > There is another way of getting on the rooftops that
> > doesn't include an exploit. I can assure you that if
> > a GM approaches you and asks how you got up there, and
> > you tell him either of these ways you won't get
> > banned or scolded.
>
> I think what he meant was that there's a safe-kill spot up
> there (one of those places where you can kill NPCs but NPCs
> won't attack you), and if a GM sees you up there he'll assume
> you're using it and ban you.

Ah, ok. Being unfamiliar with any exploits usable by
being up on the walls, and honestly never haven given
it any thought, I wasn't familiar with what might be
able to be done..

I'm still fairly sure that a GM would observe you for
a short time before banning you. If you are indeed using
the exploit, then you deserve to be banned. But I don't
believe they'd ban you just for being there without seeing
you do anything wrong. (There's regularly people on the
rooftops around the Veeshan Freeport bank..)
